title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 636 - Services And Supports For Individuals With Developmental Disabilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 636 - Services And Supports For Individuals With Developmental Disabilities

State Regulations

Subpart 636-1 - Person-Centered Planning (§ 636-1.1 to 636-1.6)

Subpart 636-2 - Home and Community Based Services and Settings Requirements (§ 636-2.1 to 636-2.5)

Subpart 636-3 - Certified Residential Opportunities (§ 636-3.1 to 636-3.8)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 636

Adopted, New

York State Register October 28, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 43, eff. 11/1/2015

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§ 13.07, 13.09[b], 16.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
